name: CreateNewCollection
description:
Create a new collection in a knowledge base.

This tool is used to create a new collection within a specified knowledge base by providing the knowledge base ID.

parameters.name: knowledge_base_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the knowledge base where the new collection will be created.

value_schema.description: The ID of the knowledge base the article is being added to.

parameters.name: collection_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing 'title', 'description', 'slug', and 'parent_collection_id' for the new collection.

parent_collection_id.description: The id of the collection associated to the article

slug.description: The slug of the collection. Defaults to a slug based on the title.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the pylon API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the knowledge base the article is being added to.

value_schema.description: The ID of the knowledge base the article is being added to.

parent_collection_id.description: The id of the collection associated to the article

slug.description: The slug of the collection. Defaults to a slug based on the title.
